about_the_game:
This is a VR game about traditional Chinese mythology. In the game, you will act as a theurgy practicer and train yourself by fighting against the Evil force until you reached the final stage of becoming immortal.

Content

Now, there are two stage of story mode you can play. Go ahead and pick up your sword to fight against the Evil force.

Guide

【Sword】Swing your right arm (handle) to fly your sword and attack targets when the target is highlighted.
【Shield】Protect you from short-range and long-range attacks. It doesn’t work for Bosses.
【Crystal】Casting spells will cost crystal. You can have at most 10 pieces of crystal. It shows at your right wrist.
【Flame】Directional skill, press “up” button on right handle to cast, cost 3 pieces of crystal.
【Freeze】Directional skill, press “down” button on right handle to cast, cost 3 pieces of crystal.
【Meteorite】Targeting skill, press “left” button on right handle to cast, cost 5 pieces of crystal.
【Sealing】AOE skill, press “right” button on right handle and draw the given shape to cast, cost 10 pieces of crystal.
【Move】Use trackpad on left handle.
【Collect】Touch the item by using left or right handle.

Expectation

We will read every single opinion and suggestion you make for us. Please enjoy the game.
QQ group: 387103581
Both English and Chinese speakers, feel free to join us.
